system.summary: Create or continue working on an item related to your specialization.

description.value: You can create one non-magical object, item, or piece of clothing that you could reasonably build with your specialization. So long as you have relevant materials equal to ¾ of the item’s cost, you can work on creating the item over the course of multiple rests. Each Rest Action you spend working on it, make an Intelligence (Craft) check against DC 10. Each success counts as 1 completed work session, a failure does not. Depending on the item’s actual cost, it takes more work sessions to complete (see @Compendium[undertaking.tables.WS5UX4KFBB0PAZAE]{Craft Artisanal} table).
